posts.post_content:
Posted By: steve yawitz
I have about a half dozen T206's available, including a few Hindus, an SGC 50 Bastian and a couple of interesting miscuts. You can check out scans and prices here: [url]http://imageevent.com/yawie99/forsalefortrade/gradedbaseball[/url].

I'd also be interested in trading for T206 St. Louisans, or really anything else for that matter.

Thanks,
Steve

Posted By: Joe G.
Steve,
Interested in buying the SGC 30 Overall Hindu back.  Please let me know how to proceed with the purchase. Thanks very much!

- Joe Grogan

Posted By: steve yawitz
I'll e-mail you in just a bit, Joe.

[url]http://imageevent.com/yawie99[/url]

Brian

The Overall arrived yesterday.  Great card - and my first Hindu. Thanks very much!

- Joe Grogan
